alert.note: Alert for Lackawanna; Wyoming (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 12:16AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Susquehanna, north central Lackawanna and northeastern Wyoming Counties through 100 AM EDT... At 1216 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Brackney to Auburn Center. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Rush, Jackson, Clifford, Susquehanna, Susquehanna Depot, Springville, Montrose, Dimock, Harford and Hallstead. This includes the following highway exits... Pennsylvania Interstate 81 between 206 and 230. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 300 AM EDT for central New York...and northeastern Pennsylvania.
